com.gcell.ibeacon.gcellbeaconscanlibrary

Class GCellBleDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gcell.ibeacon.gcellbeaconscanlibrary.GCellBleDevice

  • public class GCellBleDevice
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents a Bluetooth Low Energy Device detected by the app.

    The GCellBleDevice Class

    The GCellBleDevice class represents a Bluetooth Low Energy Device that your smart device's onboard radio can detect. This class also analyses and store information on the device, such as./p>

  • Analyse the BLE Advertsising string to identify what type of device it is
  • If it is an iBeacon it determines its Proximity UUID, Major and Minor Values
  • Performs housekeeping such as recording last time the device was seen, its RSSI (signal strength) and its approximate Proximity

    • The Proximity is approximate and can be Immediate, Near, Far, Unknown (RSSI = 0)

    In this version of the library this class represents an iBeacon when returned to the user
